title: Correction to: Occurrence and seasonal variation of human Plasmodium infection in Punjab Province, Pakistan.
abstract: After publication of the original article [1], we were notified that an author's name has been erroneously spelled. Aamir Ali Khattak should be replaced with Aamer Ali Khattak.
